meanings.sent1: The stereotyper believed all scientists were nerds.
meanings.sent2: The teacher warned the students not to be a stereotyper.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of laughter until the stereotyper arrived.
meanings.sent4: Her brother was a walking stereotyper, always judging people.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain as a stereotyper, creating conflict.

meanings.sent1: She would often stereotyper people based on their appearance.
meanings.sent2: He didn't realize he was starting to stereotyper his classmates.
meanings.sent3: The robot's job was to stereotyper objects for the factory.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to stereotyper the city skyline in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The author would stereotyper characters in her stories to make them memorable.
